response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than what you're willing to pay. However, I understand everyone has their own valuation. I am offering you this exceptional product for $145. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive benefits and features that come with it. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.", "product_price": 145}
